remarks: Membership in the base set of the free module.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 23-Jun-2019.)
statement:
frlmval.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmelbas.n $e |- N = ( Base ` R ) $.
frlmelbas.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
frlmelbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmelbas $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> ( X e. B <-> ( X e. ( N ^m I ) /\ X finSupp .0. ) ) ) $.
